alert.note: Alert for Decatur (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued March 31 at 2:16PM CDT until March 31 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 245 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN LUCAS...NORTH CENTRAL DECATUR...EASTERN CLARKE AND SOUTHEASTERN WARREN COUNTIES... At 216 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Weldon, or 6 miles south of Osceola, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Woodburn around 225 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Lucas, Lacona and Otter Creek County Park. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 26 and 31. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for south central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
